posts.post_content:
***Ty is sold***

Thought I would post this one and see if there was any interest. Presentable green Cobb portrait examples no matter the grade continue to rise. This one is nice!

If interested please drop me an email to discuss. No PM's please! Commitment to purchase outweighs any ongoing negotiations. 

If a deal is struck and PP is used please add 3%. If I know you and we've done business before a personal check is fine. If not it would need to be certified.

Thanks all, Tony
[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/threetwocount/threetwocount/t206cobbgreenfrontnoadj.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/threetwocount/threetwocount/t206cobbgreenbacknoadj.jpg[/IMG]
